languages.text: "Поймите меня правильно: в нашей ситуации отказываться от помощи Ирлиэт было бы невероятно опрометчиво. Да, мутанты есть противные Императору создания, подлежащие изничтожению, однако Человечество порой делает исключения для тех, кто способен послужить Империуму..."

traits.locale_text: "Поймите меня правильно: в нашей ситуации отказываться от помощи Ирлиэт было бы невероятно опрометчиво. Да, мутанты есть противные Императору создания, подлежащие изничтожению, однако Человечество порой делает исключения для тех, кто способен послужить Империуму..."

languages.text: "Allow me to make myself clear: to refuse Yrliet's help in our circumstances would have been incredibly rash. Yes, mutants are creatures abhorrent to the Emperor and they should be exterminated, but sometimes Humanity makes exceptions for those who can serve the Imperium..."
languages.original_text: "Поймите меня правильно: в нашей ситуации отказываться от помощи Ирлиэт было бы невероятно опрометчиво. Да, мутанты есть противные Императору создания, подлежащие изничтожению, однако Человечество порой делает исключения для тех, кто способен послужить Империуму..."

traits.locale_text: "Allow me to make myself clear: to refuse Yrliet's help in our circumstances would have been incredibly rash. Yes, mutants are creatures abhorrent to the Emperor and they should be exterminated, but sometimes Mankind makes exceptions for those who can serve the Imperium..."

"Allow me to make myself clear: to refuse Yrliet's help in our circumstances would have been incredibly rash. Yes, mutants are creatures abhorrent to the Emperor and they should be exterminated, but sometimes Mankind makes exceptions for those who can serve the Imperium..."

"Allow me to make myself clear: to refuse Yrliet's help in our circumstances would have been incredibly rash. Yes, mutants are creatures abhorrent to the Emperor and they should be exterminated, but sometimes Mankind makes exceptions for those who can serve the Imperium..."

"Allow me to make myself clear: to refuse Yrliet's help in our circumstances would have been incredibly rash. Yes, mutants are creatures abhorrent to the Emperor and they should be exterminated, but sometimes Humanity makes exceptions for those who can serve the Imperium..."

languages.text: “请允许我把话说清楚。考虑到我们目前的情况，拒绝伊莉耶特的协助是个非常草率的决定。没错，变种人确实为帝皇所憎恶，它们应该被彻底消灭。但在某些情况下，人类应该对那些能为帝国服务的变种人网开一面……”
languages.original_text: "Allow me to make myself clear: to refuse Yrliet's help in our circumstances would have been incredibly rash. Yes, mutants are creatures abhorrent to the Emperor and they should be exterminated, but sometimes Humanity makes exceptions for those who can serve the Imperium..."

traits.locale_text: “请允许我把话说清楚。考虑到我们目前的情况，拒绝伊莉耶特的协助是个非常草率的决定。没错，变种人确实为帝皇所憎恶，它们应该被彻底消灭。但在某些情况下，人类应该对那些能为帝国服务的变种人网开一面……”

languages.text: «Permítame que me explique: rechazar la ayuda de Yrliet dadas las circunstancias habría sido una temeridad. Sí, los mutantes son abominaciones ante el Emperador y deben ser exterminados, pero en ocasiones la Humanidad hace excepciones para los que pueden ser útiles al Imperium...».
languages.original_text: "Allow me to make myself clear: to refuse Yrliet's help in our circumstances would have been incredibly rash. Yes, mutants are creatures abhorrent to the Emperor and they should be exterminated, but sometimes Humanity makes exceptions for those who can serve the Imperium..."

traits.locale_text: «Permítame que me explique: rechazar la ayuda de Yrliet dadas las circunstancias habría sido una temeridad. Sí, los mutantes son abominaciones ante el Emperador y deben ser exterminados, pero en ocasiones la Humanidad hace excepciones para los que pueden ser útiles al Imperium...».

languages.text: 「私の考えをお聞きください。あの状況でユリエットの協力を断るのは、性急に過ぎると判断したのです。もちろん、変異体は皇帝にとって許しがたい生物であり、絶滅させるべきです。しかし、帝国のためになるのならば、人類は時に例外を…」
languages.original_text: "Allow me to make myself clear: to refuse Yrliet's help in our circumstances would have been incredibly rash. Yes, mutants are creatures abhorrent to the Emperor and they should be exterminated, but sometimes Humanity makes exceptions for those who can serve the Imperium..."

traits.locale_text: 「私の考えをお聞きください。あの状況でユリエットの協力を断るのは、性急に過ぎると判断したのです。もちろん、変異体は皇帝にとって許しがたい生物であり、絶滅させるべきです。しかし、帝国のためになるのならば、人類は時に例外を…」

languages.text: "Ihr gestattet, dass ich mich ganz klar ausdrücke: Yrliets Hilfe unter den aktuellen Umständen abzulehnen, wäre extrem voreilig gewesen. Ja, der Imperator verabscheut Mutanten, und sie sollten ausgelöscht werden, aber manchmal macht die Menschheit Ausnahmen, wenn es dem Imperium dient ..."
languages.original_text: "Allow me to make myself clear: to refuse Yrliet's help in our circumstances would have been incredibly rash. Yes, mutants are creatures abhorrent to the Emperor and they should be exterminated, but sometimes Humanity makes exceptions for those who can serve the Imperium..."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr gestattet, dass ich mich ganz klar ausdrücke: Yrliets Hilfe unter den aktuellen Umständen abzulehnen, wäre extrem voreilig gewesen. Ja, der Imperator verabscheut Mutanten, und sie sollten ausgelöscht werden, aber manchmal macht die Menschheit Ausnahmen, wenn es dem Imperium dient ..."

languages.text: « Que les choses soient claires : il aurait été insensé de refuser l'aide d'Yrliet dans ces circonstances. Oui, les mutants sont des créatures ignobles aux yeux de l'Empereur et il vaudrait mieux les exterminer, mais parfois, il est sage de faire une exception pour ceux qui peuvent servir l'Imperium. »
languages.original_text: "Allow me to make myself clear: to refuse Yrliet's help in our circumstances would have been incredibly rash. Yes, mutants are creatures abhorrent to the Emperor and they should be exterminated, but sometimes Humanity makes exceptions for those who can serve the Imperium..."

traits.locale_text: « Que les choses soient claires : il aurait été insensé de refuser l'aide d'Yrliet dans ces circonstances. Oui, les mutants sont des créatures ignobles aux yeux de l'Empereur et il vaudrait mieux les exterminer, mais parfois, il est sage de faire une exception pour ceux qui peuvent servir l'Imperium. »

languages.text: "İzin verin izah edeyim. Bu müşkül durumumuzda Yrliet'in yardımını reddetmek ziyadesiyle ihtiyatsızca olurdu. Doğrudur, mutantlar İmparator'un tiksindiği yaratıklardır ve yok edilmeleri gerekir lakin İnsanlık, gerektiğinde İmparatorluk'a hizmet edebilecek olanlar için istisna da yapmıştır."
languages.original_text: "Allow me to make myself clear: to refuse Yrliet's help in our circumstances would have been incredibly rash. Yes, mutants are creatures abhorrent to the Emperor and they should be exterminated, but sometimes Humanity makes exceptions for those who can serve the Imperium..."

traits.locale_text: "İzin verin açıklayayım. Bu müşkül durumumuzda Yrliet'in yardımını reddetmek ziyadesiyle ön yargılı olurdu. Doğrudur, mutantlar İmparator'un nefret ettiği yaratıklardır ve yok edilmeleri gerekir lakin İnsanlık, gerektiğinde İmparatorluk'a hizmet edebilecek olanlar için istisna da yapmıştır."
